name: Dot In Vibes
description:
Dot In Vibes is a proto of a first game idea get during the ludum dare 48 with my team, but we have done a other game, this one :https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/donut-chat
So after the jam I tryed to make a proto of this first idea in solo.

control : arrows.

goals :  reach the center

-clouds block dot

-violet plateform get a jump, you can have 2 charge (large white  dot below  the screen) in same time for jump above the clouds.

bug report :

-some time the dot disappear,   presse down arrow.

_not game over in game, when you're out of screen alt+F4

Game, music,graph, code made by Jason Huvet, after a idea of :
Gregory Colletto, Léo BG, Delphine Gueniffey, Yann Roirand, Aurélien Montero and myself.
